title: Lufthansa Cargo CL's Boeing 777-200 Freighter
subtitle: Lufthansa Cargo and Coreiso Logistics have chosen to collaborate and jointly operate the Boeing 777-200F (D-ALFX) freighter. As a leader in the global air cargo industry, Lufthansa Cargo has been seeking innovation and collaboration to address industry challenges. As a professional logistics service provider, Coreiso Logistics has rich experience and resources. The cooperation with Lufthansa Cargo will jointly improve logistics efficiency and provide customers with better services.
